import Axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [tasklist, settasklist] = useState([]); const [detail, setdetail] = useState(""); const [date, setdate] = useState(""); const [time, settime] = useState(""); const gettask = () => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/todolist").then((response) => { settasklist(response.data); }); }; return (

TODO list

{tasklist.map((val, key) => { return (

Titile: {val.title}

Detail: {val.detail}

Date: {val.date}

Time: {val.time}

); })}
); } export default App;
